resources.string: Rise and shine, %s. You\'re probably wondering what happened. You\'re in my trap. Every day of your life you have installed apps that you don\'t need. You have given all permission to them without paying attention. Now the app will be the cause of your android device death. But I will give you a chance. There are ways to win this, hidden all around you. Remember, the cause of all this is you, look at ourselves. Let the game begin.
>Do you want to play a game?[Y/N]:
Hey %s, what the hell is going on? What the app you have installed? It kicked me out and I lose the control over device. Uninstall it quick.

I have found a tape in my pocket. Voice said that his name is Billy the Android and he is playing a game with me. He said I have punish you for the indiscriminate installation of apps. You known I won\'t do it. But he said otherwise I will die. What do we do? Have you found your tape?
He have muted me and blocked volume buttons. I can\'t play the tape loud. Find a way to turn the volume up.
There is no way, but I remember somewhere there was a workaround. Try to search it.
What was said on your tape? Look at ourselves? I believe you have something on the forehead. Show me it.
What is means \"camera has been disabled because of security policy?\" I\'m the security! Oh, we have to find an unlock script in Google.
We are isolated from the outside world. Nobody can hear us. Turn the airplane mode off!
